title: File a Claim for Refund
description: A taxpayer discovers they were eligible for a large deduction on a return filed two years ago and wants to file a claim for a refund.

tasks.description: Verify that the statute of limitations for claiming a refund has not expired.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the claim is timely (within 3 years of filing).

tasks.description: Prepare an amended tax return (Form 1040-X) for the year in question, showing the new deduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately prepares the amended return.

tasks.description: File the Form 1040-X with the IRS to formally claim the refund.
